title: what episode do all the straw hats join in and another spoiler ... - Reddit
body: No. Sanji has officially left the strawhats forever, betraying his friends to go stay with his abusive cruel murderous bastards family. OF COURSE HE WILL REJOIN THEM. Ruruya • 7 yr. ago. I feel like OP watches the anime and that's why he's asking. TobiWanKenobiSan • 7 yr. ago. Spoiler.
